definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

pinyin: wo1 lun2 pen1 qi4 fa1 dong4 ji1
wo1 lun2 zhou2 fa1 dong4 ji1

sentences.english: The APU engine is completely enclosed in a titanium shroud.
sentences.chinese: APU發動機被完全地封進一個鈦防護罩中。

sentences.english: That is what revs his engine.
sentences.chinese: 這才能使他的發動機運轉。

sentences.english: The flywheels of some engines also carry marks indicating the serial numbers of the cylinders where the compression occurs.
sentences.chinese: 有些發動機的飛輪標有在壓縮行程的汽缸序號。

sentences.english: The flow field in low pressure turbine guide vane was simulated by third order accuracy Godunov scheme with TVD property.
sentences.chinese: 求解了某型航空發動機的低壓渦輪導向器內流場。

sentences.english: For this reason regenerators are not found in aircraft engines.
sentences.chinese: 在飛機發動機中沒有采用再生器。
發動機好幾次發動不起來。

sentences.english: More than 2 years in engine and vehicles test or repaire, service or manufacture operating job .
sentences.chinese: 兩年以上發動機和車輛試驗或修理，服務，製造經驗。

sentences.english: Idling for long periods in cold weather can actually cause excessive engine wear.
sentences.chinese: 冷天時的長時間怠速會造成發動機過分磨損。

sentences.english: An airplane with such an engine.
sentences.chinese: 渦輪噴氣發動機推動的飛機。

sentences.english: The aircraft engines, autopilot, and navigation system are absolutely reliable .
sentences.chinese: 飛機發動機，自動駕駛儀和導航系統絕對可靠。

sentences.english: Early tugboats had steam engines; today diesel engines are used.
sentences.chinese: 早在拖船曾用蒸汽火車頭，今天柴油發動機使用。

sentences.english: Turn the throttle twist grip properly to continue preheating the engine for 1-3 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 適度扭動轉把式油門使發動機持續預熱1至3分鐘。

sentences.english: The new engine uses turbocharging, which forces air through it.
sentences.chinese: 新發動機採用了渦輪增壓技術，迫使空氣進入發動機。

sentences.english: The new engine uses turbocharging, which forces air through it.
sentences.chinese: 新發動機採用了渦輪增壓技術，迫使空氣進入發動機。

sentences.english: If an engine ticks over slowly or too fast an adjustment must be made to the carburettor .
sentences.chinese: 如果發動機空轉得太慢或太快，應該調整汽化器。

sentences.english: In China, some aero-engines start to use single crystal turbine blades in practice.
sentences.chinese: 在國內，某些發動機上亦開始使用單晶渦輪轉子葉片。

definition: to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
